content: Hypocrite, thy name is Senate majority leader. Although I think Judge Gorsuch should be confirmed and the Dems have known it for a long time, ‘Chins’ has no shame and is one of the lead ’gators in the swamp. With his cooperation, the health care debate would be in the rear view mirror as the necessary changes to the law would have been made during Obama’s last term. But his public refusal to compromise means we can expect more push back from Democrats and — as a result — another ‘do nothing’ Congress.
